title: Mowap
description:
“ Mowap "can be used with” Yard Forced" brand robotic mowers.
your Mowap With everything installed you will be able to control, set and track your robotic lawnmower.

More APP functions available:
- Get the distributor information
- Watch the instruction video
- Get FAQ information
- Receive the status of your  robotic lawnmower
- Click Start, Stop, Home button to control your  robotic lawnmower
- Check and set the configuration of working time and date of your  robotic lawnmower
- Check and set configuration of system language of your  robotic lawnmower
- Check and set configuration of GEO protection of your  robotic lawnmower. Once the distance between your home and your  robotic lawnmower is bigger than GEO there will be a warning on APP
You can download these keywords by searching for “mower”.
descriptionHTML:
“ Mowap "can be used with” Yard Forced" brand robotic mowers.
your Mowap With everything installed you will be able to control, set and track your robotic lawnmower.

More APP functions available:
- Get the distributor information
- Watch the instruction video
- Get FAQ information
- Receive the status of your robotic lawnmower
- Click Start, Stop, Home button to control your robotic lawnmower
- Check and set the configuration of working time and date of your robotic lawnmower
- Check and set configuration of system language of your robotic lawnmower
- Check and set configuration of GEO protection of your robotic lawnmower. Once the distance between your home and your robotic lawnmower is bigger than GEO there will be a warning on APP
You can download these keywords by searching for “mower”.
